name: Autumn Bonfire
description: My Scotch-whisky-inflected alternative to a Jack Rose.
recipeIngredient: 1 oz. nonalcoholic apple cider or juice
1 oz. smoky Scottish whisky (I like Bowmore 12)
2 dashes bitters (I prefer Brooklyn Hemispherical Black Mission Fig, but Angostura works, too).

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Stir for 30 seconds. Strain into a cocktail glass (or serve over fresh ice in a rocks glass). Garnish with an apple fan or a slice of apple.
